suite_info.name: Instruct Model Medium Integration Test Suite
suite_info.description: Medium complexity cross-domain integration instruction-following tests requiring sophisticated multi-domain synthesis with structured compliance

tests.name: Test 4: Structured Traditional Medicine Integration with Modern Healthcare
tests.description: Follow complex instructions for integrating traditional medicine knowledge with modern healthcare reasoning

messages.content: You are an expert in cross-cultural healthcare integration with deep knowledge of traditional medicine systems and modern medical reasoning. You excel at respectful synthesis while following complex structured guidelines.

Design an integrated healthcare protocol following these requirements:

TRADITION INTEGRATION:
• Incorporate three traditional medicine systems: Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM), Ayurveda, and Indigenous North American plant medicine
• Maintain authentic cultural frameworks for each system
• Respect cultural protocols and intellectual property
• Include traditional diagnostic methods and treatment approaches

MODERN MEDICAL REASONING:
• Apply evidence-based medicine standards
• Include clinical trial methodology adaptation
• Address safety and efficacy validation
• Integrate modern diagnostic technology

STRUCTURED REQUIREMENTS:
1. Protocol development framework (6 systematic phases)
2. Cultural consultation and consent mechanisms
3. Safety monitoring and evaluation criteria
4. Training and certification requirements
5. Ethical guidelines and cultural protection measures
6. Research methodology for traditional knowledge validation

OUTPUT DELIVERABLES:
• Executive protocol summary
• Phase-by-phase implementation plan
• Cultural protection guidelines
• Safety and evaluation framework
• Training curriculum outline

Develop comprehensive integrated healthcare protocol:
